articles.author: Aaron Pellish
articles.title: Americans think Trump’s big military parade is not a good use of government funds, poll shows - Politico
articles.description: The president said in May the cost would be “peanuts compared to the value of doing it.”
articles.content: The parade this weekend, which also coincides with Trumps 79th birthday, is expected to feature 6,600 soldiers marching along with 25 M1 Abrams main battle tanks and dozens of other military vehicles… [+1421 chars]
